short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all text characters on the page with the letter s. It respects casing of the characters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A great extension to turn on when you're sick of reading and want a different perspective. Also works to hide what you're reading from other people who are snooping over your shoulder. :)
